## Purpose

Use this skill for Android-specific screenshot testing defaults and command mapping.

## When to use

- Android UI changed (Compose/XML/theme/style/components).
- `$visual-regression-testing` indicates platform `android`.

1) Open `references/visual-regression-android.md`.
